mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_VISITOR where substr(to_char(v_date), 1, 9) = to_date(sysdate, 'yy/MM/dd')

select b.time, nvl(a.cnt, 0) as cnt from (select TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'HH24') as time, count(*) as cnt from tb_visitor where to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_char(v_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') group by TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'HH24') order by 1) a ,(SELECT level as time, 0 as cnt FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=23 union all select 0 , 0 from dual) b where a.time(+) = b.time order by b.time

select b.time, nvl(a.cnt, 0) as cnt from ( select TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') as time,count(*) as cnt from tb_visitor where TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW'), 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') or TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW')+1, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') or TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW')+2, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') or TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW')+3, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') or TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW')+4, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') or TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW')+5, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') or TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW')+6, 'DD') = TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') group by TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'DD') order by 1) a ,(SELECT (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'IW'), 'DD')+ level-1) as time , 0 as cnt FROM DUAL CONNECT BY level <=7) b where a.time(+) = b.time order by b.time

select b.time, nvl(a.cnt, 0) as cnt from (select TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'MM') as time,count(*) as cnt from tb_visitor where TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') group by TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'MM') order by 1) a ,(SELECT level as time , 0 as cnt FROM DUAL CONNECT BY level <=12) b where a.time(+) = b.time order by b.time
